comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives: very neat and clean property, the entire staff is very polite and helpful, great location.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives:
1. Open parking, vehicles got extremely heated in sunlight.
2. No mirror in front of the dressing table in the room, which may be somewhat uncomfortable for the ladies.
3. Only one window for the without balcony room. 
4. Found small cockroaches at the table and bathroom door. Please implement paste control after certain intervals. 
5. Only one tower bolt is provided to lock the door from inside which seems to be less safe for the person inside the room. Kindly provide a strong door lock or Latch.
comments.reviewPositives:
1. House keeping and cleanliness.
2. Affordable terrif rates.
3. Ambiance, Wall paintings, Photo frames, Furniture.
4. Bed Mattress is extremely comfortable and cozy
5. Small refrigerator
6. Terrace dining and dining hall.
7. Food Quality and Test awesome.
8. Night view from terrace.
9. Very good ambiance at reception for photography.
comments.reviewTitle: Pleasant Stay and with affordable terrif in Udaipur

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: hardly anything to not like about the property
comments.reviewPositives: its accessible, located near one of the lakes and neat rooms.
comments.reviewTitle: a very comfortable and warm stay

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives:
Nice place to stay staff is very good excellent service,
View from terrace is awesome.
Good to go for Amar kothi.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: Washrooms could have been cleaner and please provide laundry bags and dental kits in the rooms.
comments.reviewPositives: the rooms are very spacious and give Kothi vibe. Location is excellent! you can enjoy the view of lake pichola from the aangan of the 1st floor. The staff is very friendly, courteous and welcoming! I am definitely looking forward to my next visit to Udaipur and Amar Kothi.
comments.reviewTitle: It was overall a very pleasant experience

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: The place looks nothing like you see in pics. The location is also not that great. Complimentary breakfast was bad.
comments.reviewPositives: The room was clean, good exteriors. Good lunch

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: Stay time
comments.reviewPositives:
Breakfast
Location good

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives:
The hospitality of the staff is really good. The location of the property is beside the Udai Villas and Chunda Palace.
The rooms are great and very comfortable. You get that typical Rajasthani touch to it which everyone wishes to experience in Udaipur. Kudos to team.
comments.reviewTitle: It is worth staying for the tariff paid.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives: The hotel staff is helpful. The place has a clean ambience.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: The room was not as per the image shown. toilet pod seat had pee stains on them and the towel were not so fresh. The hotel staff charged me GST on water bottles wich already had an MRP on them. I dont have much to say here ✌🏻
comments.reviewPositives: location was decent close to my checkout hotel and the owner was very warm and welcoming.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: No really, Just the room's fan (Both in room and the exhaust in washroom) made noise.
comments.reviewPositives:
Property is well maintained and very close to Udai Vilas and Trident Hotel.
Away from traffic and busy old city roads.
Humble and proactive staff.
comments.reviewTitle: Modern yet royal hotel with humble staff, location and in budget!

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: non
comments.reviewPositives:
Unsurpassed! The experience was sublime and I
have to commend all the staff across all
departments for their attention and effort. I particularly appreciated the sense
of ownership and support that was extended to
me. A huge shout out to the owner himself 👍

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: nothing
comments.reviewPositives:
ambience, food, taking the traveler to the roots 
of the Mughal traditions. hospitality was perfect.
comments.reviewTitle: the most beautiful boutique hotel under reasonable prices.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: Nothing.
comments.reviewPositives: The food was amazing and the staff was rge most humble staff i have ever came across

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: The shower in our room was leaking a lot. we raised the issue but it was not fixed for all the 4 days we stayed there
comments.reviewPositives: Our room was really comfortable. we felt like we were at home… the room service was quick and good. food was really nice!
comments.reviewTitle: Aamer Kothi is a must stay place. the hotel is not far from city palace, Hathipole, Fateh sagar lake and lake Pichhola.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives: The location of the hotel is really nice, talking about the place, it has great rooms with basic amenities.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives: Great ambience & fantastic detailing throughout the property . staff is friendly and extremely helpful . Dont miss out on the terrace for a scenic landscape . Food can have a little more edge to make it an all rounder . overall, highly recommended!

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives: Amazing stay here.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives: The decorations, the staff and breakfast

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: Our short stay at Udaipur
comments.reviewPositives: Rustic and artsy feel

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: Nil
comments.reviewPositives: Breakfast need to be improved with more options, as it is mentioned as continental and should meet the requirement of all types of guests..
comments.reviewTitle: Good place to stay for  tourists.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives: We stayed for 2 nights and it was super comfortable . The owner “karan” was very nice and polite and helped us to explore the city better. I will definitely recommend this property.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives:
the place is amazing you will feel like a second home 
we were stuck because of curfew but the manager as well the owner of the property that we are safe and disspited of restruction we could enjoy our anniversary with candle light roof top dinner 
the place is amazing and the food is also so yummy 
I will recommend this place to stay
comments.reviewTitle: must stay and try this property

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: breakfast should have more options
comments.reviewPositives: clean and comfortable

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: Shower head was not in the best condition. you can definitely have a bath but due to the water quality, it looked dirty. Manager understands this and he told that they replace the shower head twice a year due to water quality issue.
comments.reviewPositives: Property is maintained well. If you are looking for a peaceful stay, it is a good option. The staff is very kind and friendly. The manager “Karan” is a great person. He guided us with the best options to roam around. He definitely knows how to value a customer. Breakfast was also good.
comments.reviewTitle: Pleasant Stay with good service provided.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives:
Amezing  service  sach a wonderful experience 
Having lots of injoyful memories
Thnk you so much ☺️🙏

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives: Hotel is located in near by tourist point and room was very comfort and cleen. Staff was also attend for service with smiley 😊 face.....

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives:
The hotel is located at a decent distance from most of the attractions of Udaipur, good location. 
The rooms were spacious and clean. Staff were very helpful.
The food available at the restaurant and the complimentary breakfast was good and tasty. Enjoyable stay.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives:
Location is apt and located near all major city attraction.
Staff is humble and polite always ready to help. Food is good

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: None
comments.reviewPositives: Clean and spacious rooms, close to bike rental shops, cooperative staff.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives:
Facilities are very poor. bathroom fittings were broken
no hot water
rude staff 
very limited breakfast,no choice
comments.reviewPositives: Location

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: there’s nothing at all good. services wise zero
comments.reviewPositives: nothing at all, they don’t even provide drinking water and dental kits. no one picks up the phone on time at the reception. horrible experience
comments.reviewTitle: At this price not providing a dental kit is a stupidest thing

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: Nothing so specific as i stayed for one night only.
comments.reviewPositives: I liked the room space and its cleaniness. Food was also very good. Service was very good.
comments.reviewTitle: Overall I rate the hotel and its location excellent.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: Breakfast can be better and with more variety. The menu contain very restricted variety and prices are also high.
comments.reviewPositives: The location is perfect as every next spot to visit lies near to it. The staff is very friendly and ensures the comfort of the stay.
comments.reviewTitle: Accomodation is quite good and the staff is polite & friendly. Food can be planned from outside.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives: The stay at Hotel Amar Kothi was great with beautiful ambience, quite and peaceful with great hospitality by the staff and nice breakfast. Overall great experience.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives:
The breakfast and dinner was too good. It tastes like home. 
Cooperative staff with proper cleanliness and hygiene.
The location is good and roof top restaurant gives an awesome view of the city .

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewNegatives: Everything was perfect and i don't think so anything is required to change. Keep the things as it is.
comments.reviewPositives: The property is at awesome location... You get to visit everything in a distance of 3-4 km. The breakfast was awesome.. we both loved it alot. The manager karan was so nice. He gets everything done just in moments and makes sure that one gets the best facilities available.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewPositives: the rooms the sitting area, there wasn't anything not to like! it was beautiful
